[[Image:Protesters in Tishreen University.jpg|thumb|300px|Pro-Asad demonstration at [[Tishreen University]], [[Latakia]]]]
On 22 March, there were reports in ''[[The Guardian]]'' that the Syrian authorities had been organising pro-Assad rallies and distributing propaganda blaming the unrest on saboteurs and infiltrators.<ref name=guardian22311>{{cite news|url=http://www.guardian.co.uk/world/2011/mar/22/syrian-protests-troops-kill-deraa| title = Syrian uprising spread after troops kill at least five|work= [[The Guardian]] |date=22 March 2011 |accessdate=22 March 2011|location=London|first=Katherine|last=Marsh}}</ref> On 25 March, pro-Assad rallies were held in Damascus.<ref name=wsj25311/>
On 22 March, there were reports in ''[[The Guardian]]'' that the Syrian authorities had been organising pro-Assad rallies and distributing propaganda blaming the unrest on saboteurs and infiltrators.<ref name=guardian22311>{{cite news|url=http://www.guardian.co.uk/world/2011/mar/22/syrian-protests-troops-kill-deraa| title = Syrian uprising spread after troops kill at least five|work= [[The Guardian]] |date=22 March 2011 |accessdate=22 March 2011|location=London|first=Katherine|last=Marsh}}</ref> On 25 March, pro-Assad rallies were held in Damascus.<ref name=wsj25311/>
